StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteCollegeVisitContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegeVisitContactId int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- informa.on for an exisi.ng record can be inserted. IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitContact] where CollegeVisitContactId = @CollegeVisitContactId and @CollegeVisitContactId IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
DELETE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitContact] WHERE CollegeVisitContactId = @CollegeVisitContactId END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
